Elaina:Recall.NAME: Recall
Elaina:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add Instant to Conclusion. Cannot be elainamod:Recorded.

Elaina:RecreateMagic.NAME: RecreateMagic
Elaina:RecreateMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. elainamod:Reproduce elainamod:Conclusion, it costs 0 this turn.

Elaina:DestructionMagic.NAME: DestructionMagic
Elaina:DestructionMagic.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if elainamod:Conclusion exists. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Lose elainamod:Conclusion.

Elaina:CharmMagic.NAME: CharmMagic
Elaina:CharmMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If elainamod:Conclusion has instant, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Elaina:IceConeMagic.NAME: IceConeMagic
Elaina:IceConeMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL elainamod:Winter.

Elaina:Recollect.NAME: Recollect
Elaina:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if elainamod:Conclusion exists. NL Lose elainamod:Conclusion and gain [E]. If the lost elainamod:Conclusion has elainamod:Instant, draw 2 cards.
Elaina:Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if elainamod:Conclusion exists. NL Lose elainamod:Conclusion and gain [E][E]. If the lost elainamod:Conclusion has elainamod:Instant, draw 2 cards.

Elaina:GrowUp.NAME: Grow Up
Elaina:GrowUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! *Temporary Strength and *Temporary Dexterity. This value increases by 1 for each cycle of elainamod:Month.

Elaina:WitnessOfFriendship.NAME: Witness of Friendship
Elaina:WitnessOfFriendship.DESCRIPTION: Once per cycle, gain 1 random relic. NL Exhaust. NL elainamod:Spring.

Elaina:IndelibleImprint.NAME: Indelible Imprint
Elaina:IndelibleImprint.DESCRIPTION: elainamod:Shorthand. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When this is elainamod:Conclusion, elainamod:Recording cards and losing elainamod:Conclusion will become dealing !M! damage to a random enemy.

Elaina:HypotheticalEnemy.NAME: Hypothetical Enemy
Elaina:HypotheticalEnemy.DESCRIPTION: Double ALL enemies' Strength. NL Choose one: Double ALL enemies' elainamod:Magic_Residue, advance elainamod:Month by !M!, or gain !B! elainamod:Buffer. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:HypotheticalEnemy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double ALL enemies' Strength. NL Choose one: Triple ALL enemies' elainamod:Magic_Residue, advance elainamod:Month by !M!, or gain !B! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:IntensifyArray.NAME: Intensify Array
Elaina:IntensifyArray.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E], draw !M! additional card, apply 1 Strength to a random enemy.
Elaina:IntensifyArray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E], draw !M! additional cards, apply 1 Strength to a random enemy.

Elaina:WitchRobe.NAME: Witch Robe
Elaina:WitchRobe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If no other cards are played this turn or this card triggers elainamod:instant, gain [E]. NL elainamod:Instant.

Elaina:Rummage.NAME: Rummage
Elaina:Rummage.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and elainamod:Record these cards.

Elaina:LeavesMagic.NAME: Leaves Magic
Elaina:LeavesMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL elainamod:Autumn.

Elaina:ItsMe.NAME: It's Me
Elaina:ItsMe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL elainamod:Record 1 card in hand, apply a random enemy *Temporary Strength equal to the cost of the Recorded card. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:ItsMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL elainamod:Record 1 card in hand, apply a random enemy *Temporary Strength equal to the cost of the Recorded card minus 1. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:Penoff.NAME: Pen Off
Elaina:Penoff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:Ponder.NAME: Ponder
Elaina:Ponder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Pen Offs to your hand.

Elaina:Eh.NAME: Eh!?
Elaina:Eh.DESCRIPTION: Gain *Temporary Dexterity and Block equal to the sum of ALL enemies' Strength.

Elaina:MagicSurging.NAME: Magic Surging
Elaina:MagicSurging.DESCRIPTION: Play the last !M! cards Recorded by elainamod:Record from Diary. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times. NL Cannot be elainamod:Recorded.

Elaina:CounterMagic.NAME: Counter Magic
Elaina:CounterMagic.DESCRIPTION: Apply the target enemy's Strength bonus. Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL If Fatal, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

Elaina:Echo.NAME: Echo
Elaina:Echo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL elainamod:Record all cards played this turn. NL Retain.

Elaina:Drawup.NAME: Draw Up
Elaina:Drawup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add an *Echo to your hand, it costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:BottledHappiness.NAME: Bottled Happiness
Elaina:BottledHappiness.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Strength multiplied by !M!.

Elaina:FlashMagic.NAME: Flash Magic
Elaina:FlashMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Strength bonus, gain [E] and apply !M! Weak.

Elaina:FragrantWind.NAME: Fragrant Wind
Elaina:FragrantWind.DESCRIPTION: Apply ALL enemies !M! Weak and Vulnerable, and !D! elainamod:Magic_Residual. NL Exhaust. NL elainamod:Summer.

Elaina:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
Elaina:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: Advance elainamod:Month by !M!. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:AdjustPace.NAME: Adjust Pace
Elaina:AdjustPace.DESCRIPTION: Regress elainamod:Month by !M!. NL Add 2 *Accelerates to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:AdjustPace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Regress elainamod:Month by !M!. NL Add 2 *Accelerate+s to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:MagicEcho.NAME: Magic Echo
Elaina:MagicEcho.DESCRIPTION: The first temporary card added each turn will grant an additional copy.
Elaina:MagicEcho.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first temporary card added each turn will grant an additional copy.

Elaina:ThunderMagic.NAME: Thunder Magic
Elaina:ThunderMagic.DESCRIPTION: Costs 2 less [E] NL for each Magic played this turn. NL Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the lowest HP. When an enemy is killed, increase damage by !M! and activate the effect again. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:SilentChant.NAME: Silent Chant
Elaina:SilentChant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Release to your hand.
Elaina:SilentChant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 *Release+ to your hand.

Elaina:Spell.NAME: Release
Elaina:Spell.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When Retained, increase its value by 1 (up to a maximum of 3). NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:Reappear.NAME: Reappear
Elaina:Reappear.DESCRIPTION: elainamod:Reproduce 1 card. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:SpellReorganization.NAME: Spell Reorganization
Elaina:SpellReorganization.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block for each Retained card in your hand.

Elaina:Vibration.NAME: Vibration
Elaina:Vibration.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Fragment Magics to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:FragmentMagic.NAME: Fragment Magic
Elaina:FragmentMagic.DESCRIPTION: elainamod:Shorthand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. If you have elainamod:Spell_Boost, draw 1 card. NL Retain.

Elaina:EmergencyTreatment.NAME: Emergency Treatment
Elaina:EmergencyTreatment.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Dexterity. NL Add 1 *Emergency_Treatment to your hand. NL Apply all enemies Strength equal to the number of *Emergency_Treatment / *Emergency_Treatment+ in the discard pile.

Elaina:FirstImpression.NAME: First Impression
Elaina:FirstImpression.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard any number of cards from your hand and elainamod:Record them. Cannot be elainamod:Recorded.

Elaina:SpringJoy.NAME: Spring Joy
Elaina:SpringJoy.DESCRIPTION: If you don't have *Regeneration, gain !M! *Regeneration. Increase this value by 1 each cycle. NL elainamod:Instant.

Elaina:SummerExcitement.NAME: Summer Excitement
Elaina:SummerExcitement.DESCRIPTION: If you don't have elainamod:Spell_Boost, gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost. Increase this value by 1 each cycle. NL elainamod:Instant.

Elaina:AutumnVigilance.NAME: Autumn Vigilance
Elaina:AutumnVigilance.DESCRIPTION: If you don't have *Thorns, gain !M! *Thorns. Increase this value by 1 each cycle. NL elainamod:Instant.

Elaina:WinterPeace.NAME: Winter Peace
Elaina:WinterPeace.DESCRIPTION: If you don't have *Plated *Armor, gain !M! *Plated *Armor. Increase this value by 1 each cycle. NL elainamod:Instant.

Elaina:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
Elaina:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost. NL Lose 6 Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:Mutation.NAME: Mutation
Elaina:Mutation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When Retained, Exhaust 1 random card in your hand and add 1 *Miracle to your hand.
Elaina:Mutation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When Retained, Exhaust 1 random card in your hand and add 1 *Miracle to your hand. NL When this card is Exhausted, add 1 *Miracle to your hand.

Elaina:Endurance.NAME: Endurance
Elaina:Endurance.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card in your hand, add 1 *Mutation to your hand.
Elaina:Endurance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card in your hand, add 1 *Mutation+ to your hand.

Elaina:WitchsCauldron.NAME: Witch's Cauldron
Elaina:WitchsCauldron.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random cards with Retain to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:MagicDiffusion.NAME: Magic Diffusion
Elaina:MagicDiffusion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Conclusion has elainamod:Instant, apply elainamod:Instant to random !M! cards in your hand.
Elaina:MagicDiffusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, if Conclusion has elainamod:Instant, apply elainamod:Instant to random !M! cards in your hand.

Elaina:Rhetoric.NAME: Rhetoric
Elaina:Rhetoric.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade and elainamod:Reproduce elainamod:Conclusion.
Elaina:Rhetoric.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade all cards in Diary, elainamod:Reproduce 1 card.

Elaina:StarryShadow.NAME: Starry Shadow
Elaina:StarryShadow.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, after playing a card, elainamod:Reproduce elainamod:Conclusion until you have 6 in your hand.
Elaina:StarryShadow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Next turn, after playing a card, elainamod:Reproduce elainamod:Conclusion until you have 6 in your hand.

Elaina:Reconsitution.NAME: Reconstitution
Elaina:Reconsitution.DESCRIPTION: Lose all cards in Diary. Gain 1 random power for each card lost. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:Reconsitution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all cards in Diary. Gain 2 random powers for each card lost. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:MarblePhantasm.NAME: Marble Phantasm
Elaina:MarblePhantasm.DESCRIPTION: elainamod:Shorthand, elainamod:Record at the beginning of Diary. NL elainamod:Reproduce elainamod:Conclusion. NL When played, if this is an elainamod:Image, increase the value of all positive powers by !M!.

Elaina:DeepMemory.NAME: Deep Memory
Elaina:DeepMemory.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, elainamod:Record !M! random cards. NL elainamod:Images you play is played twice.

Elaina:WizardsWell.NAME: Wizard's Well
Elaina:WizardsWell.DESCRIPTION: elainamod:Shorthand. NL Gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost. NL When this is elainamod:Conclusion, playing Magics only reduces 1 elainamod:Spell_Boost.

Elaina:ThePerfectMe.NAME: The Perfect Me
Elaina:ThePerfectMe.DESCRIPTION: Apply elainamod:Instant to all cards in your discard pile. NL If No cards in your discard pile can receive elainamod:Instant, activate all elainamod:Instant effects in Diary. NL Cannot be elainamod:Recorded.

Elaina:ConvergenceMagic.NAME: Convergence Magic
Elaina:ConvergenceMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL elainamod:Reproduce all Magics to your hand. NL Whenever you play a Magic this turn, gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost.

Elaina:BasicMagic.NAME: Basic Magic
Elaina:BasicMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Yes, *It's *Mes to your hand.
Elaina:BasicMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Yes, *It's *Me+s to your hand.

Elaina:NewClothes.NAME: New Outfit
Elaina:NewClothes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you change elainamod:Month, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

Elaina:Reversal.NAME: Reversal
Elaina:Reversal.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Stun ALL enemies that deal damage greater than or equal to half of your current HP. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:ShowWeakness.NAME: Show Weakness
Elaina:ShowWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Vulnerable. Add 1 *Reversal to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:ShowWeakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Vulnerable. Add 1 *Reversal+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:SelfDefense.NAME: Self-Defense
Elaina:SelfDefense.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, transform 1 random card in your hand into elainamod:Image. NL Gain !M! Block when playing elainamod:Images.

Elaina:Awaken.NAME: Awaken
Elaina:Awaken.DESCRIPTION: Transform cards in your hand, discard pile, and draw pile into elainamod:Images. NL Shuffle copies of Diary cards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:SpellLink.NAME: Spell Link
Elaina:SpellLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost at the start of your turn. NL Whenever you gain elainamod:Spell_Boost, gain an equal amount of Block.

Elaina:SpellResonance.NAME: Spell Resonance
Elaina:SpellResonance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost at the start of your turn. NL Whenever you lose elainamod:Spell_Boost, ALL enemies lose an equal amount of HP.

Elaina:TimeGoesBack.NAME: Time Goes Back
Elaina:TimeGoesBack.DESCRIPTION: When played, regress elainamod:Month by X. At the start of your next X turns, advance elainamod:Month by 1, and elainamod:Reproduce 2 random cards, they cost 0 this turn.
Elaina:TimeGoesBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When played, regress elainamod:Month by X. At the start of your next X+1 turns, advance elainamod:Month by 1, and elainamod:Reproduce 2 random cards, they cost 0 this turn.

Elaina:Deviation.NAME: Deviation
Elaina:Deviation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Advance elainamod:Month by 1. NL Whenever you change elainamod:Month, increase damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:TimeMagic.NAME: Time Magic
Elaina:TimeMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Regress elainamod:Season by 1. NL Add 1 *Deviation to your draw pile.
Elaina:TimeMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Regress elainamod:Season by 1. NL Add 1 *Deviation+ to your draw pile.

Elaina:Glance.NAME: Glance
Elaina:Glance.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable and cannot be elainamod:Recorded. NL When you draw this card, draw 1 additional card and elainamod:Record your hand and Exhaust.
Elaina:Glance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable and cannot be elainamod:Recorded. NL When you draw this card, draw 1 additional card and elainamod:Record your hand.

Elaina:Quotation.NAME: Quotation
Elaina:Quotation.DESCRIPTION: elainamod:Record !M! random cards and choose 1 card to be elainamod:Recorded last. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card to be Recorded last.

Elaina:Repetition.NAME: Repetition
Elaina:Repetition.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can be played when elainamod:Conclusion has elainamod:Instant. NL Activate elainamod:Instant effect of elainamod:Conclusion !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:ExplosiveMagic.NAME: Explosive Magic
Elaina:ExplosiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL elainamod:Spell_Boost affects this card !M! times.

Elaina:Vision.NAME: Vision
Elaina:Vision.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] if the enemy has *Strength bonus. NL Gain [E] if you have elainamod:Spell_Boost.

Elaina:Gifts.NAME: Gifted Nature
Elaina:Gifts.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of powers times !M!.

Elaina:Anticipatory.NAME: Anticipatory
Elaina:Anticipatory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL elainamod:Record the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Gain [E] for each card that cannot be elainamod:Recorded.

Elaina:Redistribution.NAME: Redistribution
Elaina:Redistribution.DESCRIPTION: Transfer ALL other enemies' Strength bonuses to the enemy, gain *Temporary HP equal to its Strength. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:BestState.NAME: Peak Condition
Elaina:BestState.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next elainamod:Season_Card will be played with its strongest effect.

Elaina:AdvancedMagic.NAME: Advanced Magic
Elaina:AdvancedMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL elainamod:Spell_Boost will not be added to damage this turn. When your have elainamod:Spell_Boost, draw 1 card for each Magic played.

Elaina:DejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
Elaina:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL elainamod:Record a random card in your discard pile !M! times. NL Add 1 *Reappear to your hand.

Elaina:MagicTurbulence.NAME: Magic Turbulence
Elaina:MagicTurbulence.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of cards in Diary by 1 and shuffle its order. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:MagicTurbulence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of cards in Diary by 1 and shuffle its order. NL elainamod:Reproduce elainamod:Conclusion. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:Sublimation.NAME: Sublimation
Elaina:Sublimation.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards with Retain in your hand. NL For each card Exhausted, gain [E], and draw 1 card from the top of your discard pile. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.
Elaina:Sublimation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards with Retain in your hand. NL For each card Exhausted, gain [E], draw, and elainamod:Record 1 card from your top of the discard pile. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

Elaina:PureMagic.NAME: Pure Magic
Elaina:PureMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL elainamod:Record and Exhaust all non-Magic cards in your hand, gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost for each card Exhausted.

Elaina:Outset.NAME: Outset
Elaina:Outset.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost. NL Gain [E] equal to the number of Magics in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:Outset.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! elainamod:Spell_Boost. NL Gain [E] equal to the number of Magics in your hand.

Elaina:ProtectiveMagic.NAME: Protective Magic
Elaina:ProtectiveMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play a Magic this turn, gain !M! Block.

Elaina:IronWaveMagic.NAME: Iron Wave Magic
Elaina:IronWaveMagic.DESCRIPTION: *Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

Elaina:PerfectMagic.NAME: Perfected Magic
Elaina:PerfectMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals 2 additional damage for ALL your Magics.
Elaina:PerfectMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals 3 additional damage for ALL your Magics.

Elaina:Countermeasure.NAME: Countermeasure
Elaina:Countermeasure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! elainamod:Magic_Residue. NL Apply Retain to !M! card in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Elaina:Countermeasure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! elainamod:Magic_Residue. NL Apply Retain to !M! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:MagicAttachment.NAME: Magic Attachment
Elaina:MagicAttachment.DESCRIPTION: When played or Exhausted, apply !M! elainamod:Magic_Residue. NL Retain.

Elaina:MagicTrade.NAME: Magic Trade
Elaina:MagicTrade.DESCRIPTION: Discard all cards with Retain, draw an equal number of cards, and Apply Retain to the drawn cards. NL Exhaust.

Elaina:Review.NAME: Review
Elaina:Review.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Diary cards. Gain !B! Block for each card lost.

Elaina:IgnisFatuus.NAME: Ignis Fatuus
Elaina:IgnisFatuus.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *Ignite to your hand.

Elaina:RuneMagic.NAME: Rune Magic
Elaina:RuneMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal additionally for each extra keyword on this card.
